EmailTemplate.name: CR 2.1 Invite to reapply for 2012 Candidates
EmailTemplate.subject: Apply to work on NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact summer2014@the-challenge.org
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Many thanks for your contribution to NCS with The Challenge in 2012. Applications for our summer roles are open and we would welcome an application from you to work again in 2014.
Please follow the link below and complete the application form. Once you apply an assessment date will be sent to you in due course.
http://thechallenge.force.com/TCN/New_Job_Application
All applicants need to complete the form this year. Please tick the box that you have worked for NCS with The Challenge before.
This year we are recruiting for 2500 Summer Staff! Please feel free to forward the application to others who may be interested in working for us in 2014.
We are constantly working to improve the quality of our programme and reach out to more people. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook to help us carry on the great work!
Thank you for your ongoing interest in NCS with The Challenge.
Best Wishes, The Challenge
